actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the loan rate and established price on certain agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Provides that the level of loans and purchases on wheat crops shall not be less than 66 2/3 percent of the established per bushel price; and that on corn shall not be less than 75 percent of such price. Revises the formula for determining payments to producers of wheat, corn, and cotton crops.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the loan rate and established price on certain agricultural commodities.
